name: Dacia
startIntroPart1: Hail to you, o glorious king! Under your leadership, the Dacian tribes have been united under a single kingdom! The kingdom of Dacia spanned what is today the countries of Moldova and Romania. In your conquests and reforms, you have made the Dacian tribes into a powerful force which even the Greeks and Romans saw as a powerful threat.
startIntroPart2: The kingdom of Dacia is at your command and is poised to be a power among the Greeks, Romans and Celts. Your people look to you to bring the kingdom to great heights! Will you accept the challenge? Will you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: Want to know my they call me the Human Can Opener? Too bad.
attacked:
Zalmolxis smiles upon me from the heavens, weak one. 
You will not be walking away from this one.
defeated: ... That's it then. Zalmolxis awaits me with my brothers above, this I know. But still I must wonder... will anyone remember us?
introduction: Greetings. I am Burebista, king of all Dacians, Getae, and enlightened of wise Zalmolxis. Do not impede my divine orders and you may live alongside us.
neutralHello: Is there a reason for this conversation?
hateHello: Soulless degenerate! Get out before I open you navel to collarbone.
uniques: [+100]% Production when constructing [Dava] buildings [in all cities]
[+100]% Production when constructing [Castle] buildings [in all cities]
[+100]% Production when constructing [Arsenal] buildings [in all cities]
[+100]% Production when constructing [Military Base] buildings [in all cities]
[+100]% Production when constructing [Bomb Shelter] buildings [in all cities]
All newly-trained [{Land} {Military}] units [in all cities] receive the [Tarabostes] promotion
Damage is ignored when determining unit Strength <when fighting in [Hill] tiles>
[+4 Faith] from [{Holy Site} {Hill}] tiles [in all cities]
uniquestext:
Defensive buildings are constructed twice as fast. 

Gain 5 [Faith] when a friendly land unit is killed. Military units always fight at full strength in Hill tiles, gain attacking strength and movement in friendly hills. 
+4 [Faith] from Holy Sites on Hill tiles.

[+1 Production, -1 Gold] from [Mine] tiles [in all cities] <when at war>
